description: This table contains purposes for a given authorization record.

columns.name: AUTH_ID
columns.description: The authorization ID for the authorization record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: AUTH_PURPOSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Define the purpose the authorization record serves.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Subject


Service Details


Authorization


Utilization Tracking


AP Claim Utilization
